mapper.insert: insert into SMS_INFO (ID, MSISDN, FLAG, MSG, STS, GET_DATE, PARA1, PARA2, PARA3, SEND_DATE, MSG_ID, PRI, ACC_ID, RECV, SAVE_HIS_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{msisdn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sts,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{getDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{para1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{para2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{para3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pri,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saveHisDate,jdbcType=DATE})
